description: To address CVE-2023-36407, Microsoft has released several security updates for affected systems. For Windows 11 versions 21H2 x64-based and ARM64 systems, the patch is available as KB5032192, and for Windows 11 versions 22H2 and 23H2, the relevant update is KB5032190. Additionally, Windows Server 2022 systems should apply KB5032202. System administrators can find the update packages at the following links: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032198 for KB5032198, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192 for KB5032192, and https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190 for KB5032190. It is crucial to ensure that all applicable build numbers, such as 10.0.22621.2715 for Windows 11 Version 23H2, are updated accordingly to mitigate the risk of privilege elevation issues.
